text: Today on the West Coast, itâ€™s blown out with 8 ft @15s WNW swell and fresh 26 mph SSW winds. Tomorrow sees a bit of an increase with 11 ft @13s W swell, but the 25 mph SW winds will keep it messy. By the day after, the swell drops to 6 ft @10s, still with fresh 29 mph SSE winds, making it a tough call. Best: none.
